nodes.text: Solace was a city located on the planet Cerosha, on the edge of the Boralic Sea. At one point, Solace was a bustling city occasionally protected by an individual known to the inhabitants as the Wanderer. Some time after the Wanderer's disappearance, another figure known as the Dark Wraith was seen in Solace. According to the citizens of the nearby city of Mock, Solace was destroyed by the Dark Wraith for disobedience, and the ruins of the city were left as a stark reminder.
